Package sweng.campusbirdsguide.presentation.elements

Class RectangleElement

java.lang.Object
sweng.campusbirdsguide.presentation.elements.PresentationElement
sweng.campusbirdsguide.presentation.elements.RectangleElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
ShapeElement
public class RectangleElement extends PresentationElement implements ShapeElement
RectangleElement implements the rectangle presentation element with behaviour respectful of SWENG standard v3.

    • RectangleElement

      public RectangleElement(int width, int height, int colour, int borderWidth, int borderColour, int x, int y)
      RectangleElement constructor.
      Parameters:
      width - Rectangle width in presentation units.
      height - Rectangle height in presentation units.
      colour - Fill colour.
      borderWidth - Border width in DP.
      borderColour - Border Colour
      x - X coordinate on slide.
      y - Y coordinate on slide.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw(Canvas canvas, Slide slide)
      Description copied from interface: ShapeElement
      This method is called when the element is being drawn. The drawing behaviour should be defined within.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface ShapeElement
      Parameters:
      canvas - The canvas to draw on.
      slide - The slide where the element is stored.
